name: Haldiram
description:
Here's a short and inviting travel description:

Experience the authentic flavors of India at Haldiram, a beloved Delhi institution serving up delicious traditional cuisine in the heart of the city. From savory street food to rich desserts, this iconic eatery is a must-visit for any traveler looking to taste the real Delhi.

name: Pizza Hut
description:
Here's a short and inviting travel description:

Indulge in the flavors of Italy at Pizza Hut in Delhi, where every bite is a delicious blend of cheese, sauce, and crispy crust. Whether you're looking for a quick lunch or a satisfying dinner, this popular restaurant serves up hot, freshly baked pizzas that are sure to satisfy your cravings.

name: Costa
description:
Here is a short and inviting travel description:

Escape to the charming Costa in Delhi, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the air and the vibrant atmosphere of a bustling café beckons you to stay awhile. Indulge in a cup of your favorite brew at this cozy coffee shop, nestled in the heart of the city.

name: Thaï Garam
description:
Here's a short and inviting travel description:

Escape to the flavors of Thailand in the heart of Delhi at Thaï Garam, where the aromatic scents of street food meet the vibrant energy of India. Savor authentic Thai dishes amidst the bustling streets of this cosmopolitan city.

osm_tags.name: Loving Hut - The Vegan Paradise
